ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESGOUser.GID AS GID, ESGOUser.UserID AS UserID, ESGOUser.Name AS Name, FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fTradeAccountGID AS fTradeAccountGID, FK_ESGOUserSite_ESFITradeAccount.fPersonCodeGID AS fPersonCodeGID, FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fCompanyCode AS fCompanyCode, FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fCompanySiteGID AS fCompanySiteGID, FK_ESGOUserSite_ESFITradeAccount.Code AS Code FROM ESGOUser AS ESGOUser INNER JOIN ESGOUserSite AS FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser ON ESGOUser.GID = FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fUserGID LEFT JOIN ESFITradeAccount AS FK_ESGOUserSite_ESFITradeAccount ON FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fTradeAccountGID = FK_ESGOUserSite_ESFITradeAccount.GID WHERE (ESGOUser.GID = ##(ESUSERGID)) AND (FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (FK_ESGOUserSite_ESGOUser.fCompanySiteGID = ##(ESBRANCHGID))
